mapper.select: SELECT ner.P_NAME, ner.P_AGE, ner.P_CODE, pi.I_ATTITUDE, pi.I_CREATIVITY, pi.I_POSITIVENESS, pi.I_RELIABILITY, pi.I_SCRUPULOSITY, pi.P_CHALLENGE, pi.P_COOPERATION, pi.P_CREATIVITY, pi.P_GLOBALMIND, pi.P_PASSION FROM PERSONALITY_INTERVIEW pi, NEW_EMP_RESUME ner WHERE pi.P_CODE = ner.P_CODE AND ner.year = #{year} AND ner.half = #{half}
mapper.update: UPDATE NEW_EMP_RESUME SET P_NAME = #{p_name}, P_AGE = #{p_age}, P_GENDER = #{p_gender}, P_ADDRESS = #{p_address}, P_TEL = #{p_tel}, P_EMAIL = #{p_email}, P_DEPT = #{p_dept}, P_LAST_SCHOOL = #{p_last_school}, P_CAREER = #{p_career} WHERE P_CODE = #{p_code}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(P_CODE + 1) FROM NEW_EMP_RESUME WHERE P_CODE LIKE TO_CHAR(#{year}) || TO_CHAR(#{half}) || '%' AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY P_CODE desc
SELECT TO_CHAR(#{year}) || TO_CHAR(#{half}) || '0001' AS P_CODE FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NEW_EMP_RESUME (YEAR, HALF, P_CODE, P_NAME, P_AGE, P_GENDER, P_ADDRESS, P_TEL, P_EMAIL, P_DEPT, P_LAST_SCHOOL, P_CAREER) SELECT #{year}, #{half}, #{p_code}, #{p_name}, #{p_age}, #{p_gender}, #{p_address}, #{p_tel}, #{p_email}, #{p_dept}, #{p_last_school}, #{p_career} FROM (SELECT YEAR, HALF FROM TERMS_EMP WHERE ( YEAR = #{year} AND HALF = #{half} ) AND ( MIN_AGE <= #{p_age} AND MAX_AGE >= #{p_age} ) AND ( DEPT = #{p_dept} OR DEPT = '무관' ) AND ( DECODE( #{p_last_school} , '초졸' , 1 , '중졸' , 2 , '고졸' , 3 , '2년제대학' , 4 , '4년제대학' , 5 , 0 ) >= DECODE( LAST_SCHOOL , '초졸' , 1 , '중졸' , 2 , '고졸' , 3 , '2년제대학' , 4 , '4년제대학' , 5 , 0 ) ))

INSERT INTO PERSONALITY_INTERVIEW (P_CODE, P_CHALLENGE, P_CREATIVITY, P_PASSION, P_COOPERATION, P_GLOBALMIND, I_ATTITUDE, I_SCRUPULOSITY, I_RELIABILITY, I_CREATIVITY, I_POSITIVENESS) SELECT #{p_code}, #{p_challenge}, #{p_creativity}, #{p_passion}, #{p_cooperation}, #{p_globalmind}, #{i_attitude}, #{i_scrupulosity}, #{i_reliability}, #{i_creativity}, #{i_positiveness} FROM (SELECT P_CODE FROM NEW_EMP_RESUME WHERE P_CODE = #{p_code})
